records.where_clear: Incident occurred in an operational area at sea, location redacted.
records.location_text_raw: Latitude: Text removed - Operational Area, Longitude: Text removed - Operational Area, Location details: Text removed - Operational Area
records.uncertainty_note: Location details are redacted as 'Text removed - Operational Area'.

possible_violations.violation_name: Situations of potential violations of Fundamental Rights or international protection obligations

records.context_note: 571 migrants were carried on board two vessels (one Frontex asset, one non-Frontex asset). One corpse and one medevac case due to severe spleen pain were reported. The incident occurred in an operational area at sea.
records.evidence_quote: nr.331 migrants plus nr. 1 corpse in position Text Removed - Operational Area (276 male, 12 female and 43 minor); - nr. 240 migrants in position Text Removed - Operational Area (all male, 16 minor). - nr. 1 Medevac case due to severe spleen pain on Text removed - Technical Equipment (No Frontex asset) is sailing towards Text Removed - Operational Area
